---

# deserializeHookConfig

Deserializes a given hex string into a HookConfig object.
The hex string must be a 26-byte hex string, prefixed with `0x`.

## Import

```ts
import { deserializeHookConfig } from "@account-kit/smart-contracts";
```

## Usage

```ts
const config = deserializeHookConfig(
  "0xAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA000004D20001"
);
```

## Parameters

### hex

`Hex`
A 26-byte hex string representing the hook configuration, prefixed with `0x`

## Returns

`HookConfig`
An object representing the deserialized hook configuration
